nodes.text: Korventine was a female Zabrak who served as a captain within the army of the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. During the war she was stationed in the Republic's secret prison on the planet Belsavis. In the prison she operated a stall in the Prison Command Center of the Minimum Security Section, where she sold equipment from a stall to various Republic personnel. She wore armor with orange coloring and carried a blaster pistol while at his stall. Lorchlar had brown skin, black hair, and green eyes.

Captain Korventine appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Equipment Commendations Vendor for Republic players on Belsavis. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Korventine was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors.
